문서를_등록하면_챗봇과_문서에_대해_대화할_수_있습니다: Registering documents allows you to converse with chatbots and documents.
관리자에_의해_생성된_모델로_삭제가_불가능합니다: Deletion is not possible for models created by the administrator.
등록한_문서를_확인하고_수정할_수_있습니다: You can check and modify the registered documents.
다른_키워드나_기간을_재설정_해보세요: Try resetting different keywords or periods.
주의_한번_설정한_문서명은_변경할_수_없습니다: Caution! Once set, the document name cannot be changed.
신규_문서를_생성중입니다_잠시만_기다려주세요: Creating a new document. Please wait a moment.
pdf_문서_파일을_첨부한_후_생성_버튼을_눌러주세요: Attach a pdf document file and press the create button.
모델명은_단어로_입력할_수_있습니다: The model name can be entered as a word.
모델명_중복_확인을_해주세요: Please check for duplicate model names.
ChunkSize는_300에서_700_사이의_정수여야_합니다: ChunkSize must be an integer between 300 and 700.
ChunkOverlap은_0에서_200_사이의_정수여야_합니다: ChunkOverlap must be an integer between 0 and 200.
모델명은_한글_알파벳_숫자_공백만_허용됩니다: The model name allows only Korean, English, numbers, spaces, and blank spaces.
통합_관리자_페이지에서_계정_등록이_필요하니_고객센터로_문의_부탁_드립니:
Account registration is required on the integrated administrator page. 
 Please contact the customer center.
각_파일의_최대_사이즈는_30MB_이내이며_5개까지_등록_가능합니다: The maximum size of each file is 30MB and up to 5 files can be registered.
등록_가능_파일은_pdf_입니다: The file that can be registered is .pdf.
pdf_파일을_끌어와_파일을_업로드해주세요: Drag and upload the pdf file.
파일_크기는_최대_30MB까지_가능합니다: The file size can be up to 30MB.
최대_5개의_파일만_첨부_가능합니다: Up to 5 files can be attached.
PDF_파일만_업로드_할_수_있습니다: Only PDF files can be uploaded.
이미_동일한_이름의_파일이_첨부되어있습니다: A file with the same name is already attached.
파일_첨부는_PC환경에서만_가능합니다_PC에서_시도해주세요: File attachment is only available on PC. Please try on PC.
파일이_업로드되었습니다_임베딩을_기다려_주세요: The file has been uploaded. Please wait for embedding.
파일_업로드_중_오류가_발생했습니다: An error occurred during file upload.
모델이_정상적으로_생성되었습니다: The model has been successfully created.
챗봇에서_사용중인_문서입니다: This is a document in use in the chatbot.
